about:
Software Engineer with 15 years of experience in hands-on engineering and technical leadership. I've led teams that scaled platforms from zero to 10 million users and built tools used by companies like Disney and Microsoft.

I focus on Agentic workflows, LLM applications, and automation pipelines tailored to complex business needs.

experiences.description:
• Built the core AI platform from scratch: multi-agent research systems, data pipelines, and automation tools that processed millions of records daily. Architected job queuing, rate limiting, and data validation infrastructure.
• Led technical direction across the engineering team. Owned code quality, architecture decisions, and system integration.
• red custom enterprise solutions including competitor price monitoring systems, large-scale supplier data collection, and internal tools replacing manual spreadsheet workflows.
• Created and open-sourced Mira, a multi-agent AI system for automated company research.
experiences.title: Founding Software Engineer

experiences.description:
• Helped design an AI marketing automation and content generation system for real estate professionals that streamlined the creation of blog posts, newsletters, social media content, and visual assets, along with an AI-powered page builder for internal pages.
• Collaborated directly with CEO on prompt engineering strategy and implemented comprehensive testing framework for validating and maintaining LLM output quality.
experiences.title: AI Engineer

experiences.description:
•  Led a team of engineers as platform scaled from 0 to 10 million users worldwide. Managed hiring, sprint planning, and code reviews as company grew from 6 to 60 people.
•  Architected and built core platform features including multi-user game streaming, video conferencing, and real-time 3D filters, all running simultaneously in a single browser requiring complex performance optimization.
experiences.location: Santa Clara County, California, United States
experiences.title: Lead Engineer

experiences.description:
•  Built web-based editor for designing data models and database queries, used internally by companies like Disney and Microsoft to create APIs through visual interface.
•  Implemented unit, end-to-end, and load testing infrastructure that improved system robustness.
•  Managed two external engineers to integrate schema visualization and relationship mapping features into the editor.
experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer

experiences.description:
•  Optimized performance of a web application used by a couple of million users per day, resulting in 30% improvement in page speed.
•  Migrated legacy Angular to modern React application with focus on reusability, scalability, and best practices, leading to significant reduction in customer complaints.
experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer

experiences.description: • Built features for custom design system used by hundreds of internal applications and developed internal tools for managing thousands of employees.
experiences.title: Software Engineer

experiences.description:
•  Led the design and front-end development of the core application, managing the full user experience from wireframe to deployment to achieve market launch.
•  Built internal QA automation and monitoring tools that reduced merchant-reported bugs.
experiences.title: Front-end Engineer

experiences.description:
•  Participated in full product development cycle from ideation through deployment.
•  Managed project scheduling and coordinated with clients on scope changes and technical challenges.
experiences.title: Web Engineer

headline: Software Engineer | Agentic AI Systems

verifications.description: Verified by Persona using government ID
